thread.title: Jump A Motorcycle And Die With The Jabronis From It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia
thread.title_full: Jump A Motorcycle And Die With The Jabronis From It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia

author: Andrew P Collins on Lanesplitter, shared by Michael Ballaban to Jalopnik
title: Jump A Motorcycle And Die With The Jabronis From It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia
text:
Go to permalink (Image Credit: FXX/YouTube) 
360-degree “virtual reality” YouTube videos are lame and gimmicky most of the time. But come on, I know you’re not about to turn down the opportunity to be part of Project Badass. 
For those of you unfamiliar with It’s Always Sunny In Philadelphia , I’m not really sure where to start. Basically, it’s a show about five friends that hate each other? And everyone is terrible? Pretty sure it’s a documentary of the universal human experience of somesort. Advertisement 
When you join the gang in this clip, you’ve been roped into one of Mac’s ill-conceived Jackass -inspired Project Badass videos. Hilarity ensues. Also, death. TV for your watching.
